title: Lakers' Deadline Inactivity
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Ramona Shelburne and Dave McMenamin to talk the Lakers’ inactivity at the trade deadline, why LA wants this team to figure things out and what that means for the future of the team and LeBron James.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
